statements: SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email, role, is_moderator FROM users WHERE is_moderator = TRUE;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, email, is_moderator FROM users ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE is_moderator = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'Editor' AND is_moderator = FALSE;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id, created_at FROM user_permissions WHERE role_id = '09876543-21cd-34ef-5678-910112131415' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'admin' AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, role_id, created_at, updated_at FROM user_permissions WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, role_id, created_at, updated_at FROM user_permissions WHERE role_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, role_name, description FROM user_permissions INNER JOIN roles ON user_permissions.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions ORDER BY updated_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(role_id) AS role_count FROM user_permissions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(role_id) >= 2;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_name='read';
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id=1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email, role FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.role = r.role_name JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users INNER JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01' AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role_id = 2 ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id
SELECT user_id, COUNT(user_id) AS role_count FROM user_roles GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 1
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;

SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM roles WHERE role_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_roles JOIN users ON user_roles.user_id = users.user_id;

SELECT username, role_name, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
